dmca.title: Copyright infringement notice
dmca.body:
----Original Message-----
From: WHIRLYCOTT [mailto:phil@whirlycott.com] 
Sent: Friday, August 11, 2006 11:04 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: Beatrice Peltre
Subject: Copyright infringement notice
Importance: High

Attention: DMCA Agent

This electronically signed email provides you with notice that a website
hosted on your network, www.bfeedme.com, is infringing on copyrights
owned by my wife and I.

We own and operate www.beaskitchen.com (see whois for verification).   
One of your clients, www.bfeedme.com, has violated our copyright by
illegally copying our electronic properties, removing copyright notices
that we placed on our copyrighted material and republishing it on
www.bfeedme.com.

Our copyrighted material is visible at this web address:

http://www.beaskitchen.com/blog/2006/08/03/souffle-glace-au-citron-
vert-et-aux-graines-de-pavot-iced-lime-souffle-with-poppyseeds/

The material on your network that violates our copyright is visible at
this web address:

http://www.bfeedme.com/strawberry-brown-sugar-souffle

Both a copyrighted photograph and copyrighted textual content are at
issue in this case.

The website www.bfeedme.com is not a licensee of this copyrighted
content and has neither requested nor received our permission to
republish it.  We demand that this copyrighted material be removed from
your systems immediately.

Under penalty of perjury, I affirm that the information contained within
this electronically signed email is accurate.

I can be reached at 617 331 1923 or via email at phil@whirlycott.com or
bea@beaskitchen.com.

phil.

--
                                    Whirlycott
                                    Philip Jacob
                                    phil@whirlycott.com
                                    http://www.whirlycott.com/phil/
